name: Zombies (tommaso_maga)
description:
Zombies is a survival game based in an apocalyptic city.

The goal of the game is to kill all the zombies, until you are the last survivor!

This game was coded following the theme of Brackey's sixth game jam - Let There Be Chaos.

To play the game simply download the zip folder and extract the files, then launch the application called "My Project".

Controls - 

W - move forward

A - move left

S - move right

D - move backward

Space - jump 

LMB - Shoot

Enjoy!
